GENERAL.paths_not_found: Paths not found. Please add path to configuration file or run scanner.

SETTING.thanksToAutors: Thanks to the authors of the translations
SETTING.thanks: Many thanks to everyone who helps the project

BOTTOM.open_game_folder_tooltip: The path selected in the settings will open
BOTTOM.launch_game_tooltip: The game will start at the path selected in the settings

TOOLTIPS.shops_qwer_tooltip:
Changes hotkeys for shopping to:
QWER
ASDF
ZXCV

GAMEOPTIONS.idontwanttovisitsite: I dont want to visite site

TOOLTIPS.widescreen_tooltip: Highly recommended to turn on when playing with widescreen monitors. Can be changed during game via -ws command.
TOOLTIPS.AutoFPSLimit_tooltip: Strictly limits FPS at 64, no matter other options.
TOOLTIPS.LockMouseAtWindow_tooltip: For window mode only. Mouse cursor will stay inside game window.
TOOLTIPS.AutoselectHero_tooltip: Automatically selects and orders hero when nobody or uncontrollable units are selected.
TOOLTIPS.TeleportationCanOnlyBeStopped_tooltip: Prevents accidental cancelling of Teleportation channeling. Player should order 'stop' or 'hold' to interrupt it in fast pace.
TOOLTIPS.CloseWC3EveryGame_tooltip: Closes WC3 after every game instead of going into Main Menu. This may be helpful if you're experiencing problems with game stability.
TOOLTIPS.AutoattackEnabledHeroes_tooltip: Toggles autoattack for hero. Can be changed during game via -aath command.
TOOLTIPS.AutoattackEnabledUnits_tooltip: Toggles autoattack for non-hero units except wards. Can be changed during game via -aatu command.
TOOLTIPS.AutoattackDisabledByStopOnlyHeroes_toolt: An alternative option for handling autoattack, which temporary turns off autoattack by clicking 'stop'. Requires Autoattack to be enabled. Affects heroes.
TOOLTIPS.AutoattackDisabledByStopOnlyUnits_toolti: An alternative option for handling autoattack, which temporary turns off autoattack by clicking 'stop'. Requires Autoattack (units) to be enabled. Affects non-hero units except wards.
TOOLTIPS.SmartAttackEnabled_tooltip: Alternates A-click on ground: instead of ordering attack-move you will be giving attack order against closest to cursor enemy. Can be changed during game via -smartattack command.
TOOLTIPS.RightClickDeny_tooltip: Right mouse click will order attacks against deniable allies similarly to a-click on them. Can be changed during game via -md command.
TOOLTIPS.SelectionHelperEnabled_tooltip: Automatically selects summoned units. Works only if caster is selected at the moment of summoning. Can be changed during game via -sh command.
TOOLTIPS.DoubleClickHelperDisabled_tooltip: Click ability key twice to cast spell on self. Affects only spells which can be cast on self. Can be changed during game via -dch command.
TOOLTIPS.IDontWantToVisitSite_tooltip: Turn off to not receive advertising. Affects only players who do not have any skins or other in-game bonuses.
TOOLTIPS.IAmShy_tooltip: Turn off to not be listed in gratitude strings during game. Affects only players has skins or other in-game bonuses.
TOOLTIPS.Membershipeffect_tooltip:
The level of love expressed in money.

Amethyst:
Month: $8 | 3 Months: $16

Silver:
Month: $14 | 3 Months: $20

Gold:
Month: $20 | 3 Months: $40

VISUALS.alwaysdisplayrangemarkers: Always display towers attack range markers
VISUALS.RepeatGameMessagesIntoChatLog: Repeat game messages into chat log

TOOLTIPS.UIManacostDisplay_tooltip: Shows abilities manacost and items goldcost on their icons. Turn off if amount of information on screen feels overwhelming.
TOOLTIPS.AlwaysDisplayRangeMarkers_tooltip: Turn on to always hightlght towers and outposts range without clicking 'Alt'.
TOOLTIPS.AlwaysDisplayNeutralMarkers_tooltip: Turn on to always hightlght neutral camps borders without clicking 'Alt'.
TOOLTIPS.AlwaysDisplayHPRegen_tooltip: Alternates HP and MP info on portrait from HP/MaxHP to HP+HPRegen, and so for MP.
TOOLTIPS.GoodMinimap_tooltip: Alternates minimap between detailed (on) and simple (off). Can be changed during game via -minimap 1 and -minimap 2 commands.
TOOLTIPS.AlliesAlwaysGreen_tooltip: Allies will be shown as green on minimap
TOOLTIPS.BetterFPS_tooltip: Disables some visual stuff in order to play on a bucket. May cause visual bugs. Can be changed during game via -betterfps command.
TOOLTIPS.BetterFPS2_tooltip: Disables even more visual stuff in order to play on a bucket. May cause visual bugs. Can be changed during game via -betterfps 2 command.
TOOLTIPS.DisableDefaultSpace_tooltip: Disables default Space click behaviour of WC3 which moves to location of last message.
TOOLTIPS.DisableDefaultMouseWheel_tooltip: Disables default mouse wheel behaviour of WC3 which changes camera height and angle.
TOOLTIPS.ShowItemsInMultiboard_tooltip: Shows allied inventory in multiboard. Can be changed in game via -ii command, and can toggle abilities display via -si command.
TOOLTIPS.IgnoreAllChat_tooltip: Ultimative feature to make game less toxic. Type -mute in game to receive hints about more specialized options.
TOOLTIPS.RepeatGameMessagesIntoChatLog_tooltip: Repeats all game messages in chat history to not miss anything.
TOOLTIPS.AlwaysShowCourierButton_tooltip: That little button near minimap when courier is free.
TOOLTIPS.HideMinimapSignals_tooltip: You won't see and hear minimap pings from players, however, provided by a game pings will be still shown. Type -mute in game to receive hints about more specialized options.
TOOLTIPS.ColorblindMode_tooltip: This option is barely supported and has nearly no use.
TOOLTIPS.AdvancedStatsIconDisabled_tooltip: Removes 'Unit Stats' info to improve performance.
TOOLTIPS.CameraFlip_tooltip: Experimental feature which turns camera by 180 degrees. Allows to look on a game from new direction. Can be changed during game via -camflip command.
TOOLTIPS.SmoothFogReveal_tooltip: Affects frequency of visual renewing fog of war on a battlefield. Do not affect visibility of objects.
TOOLTIPS.ClassicIngameTime_tooltip: KDA/KDN info is displayed near time in topright corner. Turn on to return to more classic version.
TOOLTIPS.DisplayAllyGoldOnSelection_tooltip: Game will display gold of ally instead of own when selecting allied unit.
TOOLTIPS.ShowFullWardRadiusObserver_tooltip: Changes cursor on circle when casting Observer Ward with a radius equal to ward's visibility range
TOOLTIPS.ShowFullWardRadiusSentry_tooltip: Changes cursor on circle when casting Sentry Ward with a radius equal to ward's true sight range
TOOLTIPS.ShowFullWardRadiusPlague_tooltip: Changes cursor on circle when casting Plague Ward with a radius equal to ward's attack range
TOOLTIPS.ShowFullWardRadiusNether_tooltip: Changes cursor on circle when casting Nether Ward with a radius equal to ward's aura range
TOOLTIPS.ShowFullWardRadiusTombstone_tooltip: Changes cursor on circle when casting Tombstone with a radius equal to ward's attack range
TOOLTIPS.ShowFullWardRadiusIcySpirit_tooltip: Changes cursor on circle when casting Icy Spirit with a radius equal to ward's attack range

TOOLTIPS.CustomBarFixedSides_tooltip: Alternates options from 'Allied color' and 'Enemy color' to 'Sentinel players' and 'Scourge players' relatively
